parameters.query:
WITH vals AS (
  SELECT
    '{{ $json.client?.id || "" }}' AS client_id_text,
    '{{ $json.tenant_id }}' AS tenant_id_text
),
v AS (
  SELECT 
    CASE
      WHEN client_id_text ~* '^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}$'
        THEN client_id_text::uuid
      ELSE NULL
    END AS client_id,
    CASE
      WHEN tenant_id_text ~* '^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}$'
        THEN tenant_id_text::uuid
      ELSE NULL
    END AS tenant_id
  FROM vals
)
SELECT a.id, a.stage, a.phone_model, a.model_id, a.problem_description, a.created_at, a.operation_mode
FROM appeals a
JOIN v ON v.client_id IS NOT NULL
WHERE a.client_id = v.client_id
  AND a.tenant_id = v.tenant_id
  AND a.stage NOT IN ('Завершено', 'Отменено')
  AND a.created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'
ORDER BY a.created_at DESC
LIMIT 1;

INSERT INTO appeals (
    tenant_id,
    client_id,
    device_type_id,
    brand_id,
    repair_type_id,
    ad_channel_id,
    ad_id,
    stage,
    operation_mode,
    created_at
  )
  VALUES (
    '{{ $json.tenant_id }}'::uuid,
    '{{ $json.client.id }}'::uuid,
    NULL,
    NULL,
    NULL,
    (SELECT id FROM channels WHERE code = '{{ $json.channel }}' LIMIT 1),
    NULLIF('{{ $json.meta.ad_id }}', ''),
    'Первичный контакт',
    (SELECT COALESCE(operation_mode, 'assist') FROM tenants WHERE id = '{{ $json.tenant_id }}'::uuid),
    NOW()
  )
  RETURNING *;

WITH vals AS (
  SELECT
    '{{ $json.tenant_id || "" }}'            AS tenant_id_text,
    '{{ $json.appeal?.id || "" }}'           AS appeal_id_text,
    '{{ $json.message_type || $json.role || "client" }}' AS message_type_text,
    '{{ $json.text || "" }}'                 AS message_text,
    '{{ $json.channel || "" }}'              AS channel_code,
    '{{ $json.external_message_id || "" }}'  AS ext_msg_id,
    '{{ $json.external_chat_id || "" }}'     AS ext_chat_id
),
validated AS (
  SELECT
    CASE
      WHEN tenant_id_text ~* '^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}$'
        THEN tenant_id_text::uuid
      ELSE NULL
    END AS tenant_id,
    CASE
      WHEN appeal_id_text ~* '^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}$'
        THEN appeal_id_text::uuid
      ELSE NULL
    END AS appeal_id,
    NULLIF(message_type_text,'') AS message_type,
    NULLIF(message_text,'')      AS message_text,
    NULLIF(channel_code,'')      AS channel_code,
    NULLIF(ext_msg_id,'')        AS ext_msg_id,
    NULLIF(ext_chat_id,'')       AS ext_chat_id
  FROM vals
),
refs AS (
  SELECT
    v.tenant_id,
    v.appeal_id,
    v.message_type,
    v.message_text,
    (SELECT id FROM channels WHERE code = v.channel_code LIMIT 1) AS channel_id,
    v.channel_code,
    v.ext_msg_id,
    v.ext_chat_id
  FROM validated v
)
INSERT INTO messages_history (
  tenant_id,
  appeal_id,
  message_type,
  message_text,
  channel,
  channel_id,
  external_message_id,
  external_chat_id
)
SELECT
  r.tenant_id,
  r.appeal_id,
  COALESCE(r.message_type, 'client'),
  COALESCE(r.message_text, ''),
  r.channel_code,
  r.channel_id,
  r.ext_msg_id,
  r.ext_chat_id
FROM refs r
WHERE r.appeal_id IS NOT NULL AND r.tenant_id IS NOT NULL
RETURNING *;
